Article.ArticleTitle: Long-COVID: Spotlight on National Institutes of Health Funding and Registered Trials.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Anesthesia and Pediatric Oncology, Indiana University School of Medicine, Bloomington, IN, USA.

Reference.Citation: National Institutes of Health. Notice of Intent to Publish Research Opportunity Announcements (OTA-21-015) for the Post-Acute Sequelae of SARS-CoV-2 Infection (PASC) Initiative. Online document at: https://covid19.nih.gov/sites/default/files/2021-02/PASC-Pre-Notice.pdf Accessed May 29, 2022.

National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health (NCCIH), National Institutes of Health. NCCIH Interest in Research to Prevent and Treat Long COVID. Online document at: www.nccih.nih.gov/research/blog/nccih-interest-in-research-to-prevent-and-treat-long-covid Accessed May 29, 2022.
RECOVER. RECOVER: Researching COVID to Enhance Recovery. Online document at: https://recovercovid.org/ Accessed May 29, 2022.

National Institutes of Health (NIH). NIH Makes First Infrastructure Awards to Support Research on Post COVID Conditions. Online document at: www.nih.gov/about-nih/who-we-are/nih-director/statements/nih-makes-first-infrastructure-awards-support-research-post-covid-conditions Accessed May 29, 2022.
National Institutes of Health. Research Opportunity Announcement OTA-21-015H RECOVER Clinical Trials. Online document at: https://recovercovid.org/docs/RECOVER_CT_ROA.pdf Accessed May 29, 2022.

ClinicalTrials.gov, National Institutes of Health. Acupuncture Therapy for COVID-Related Olfactory Loss. Online document at: https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT04952389?term=acupuncture&cond=COVID-19&cntry=US&draw=2&rank=1 Accessed May 29, 2022.

ClinicalTrials.gov, National Institutes of Health. A Randomized Phase II Study to Investigate the Effectiveness of ACUpuncture for the Relief of Long COVID Related Fatigue (ACU-COVID). Online document at: https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT05212688?term=acupuncture&cond=long+COVID&draw=2&rank=1 Accessed May 29, 2022.

ClinicalTrials.gov, National Institutes of Health. Acupressure and Qigong in Chronic Fatigue Post COVID-19. (ACUQiG). Online document at: https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT05289154?term=acupuncture&cond=COVID-19&draw=3&rank=14 Accessed May 29, 2022.
